ComoFunciona_Titulo: How Car Import Works at Autogo
ComoFunciona_Subtitulo: Transparency, speed and safety at every step.
ComoFunciona_Intro: See the steps of the car import process.

ComoFunciona_Steps.title: Stock Vehicles & Pre-selection
ComoFunciona_Steps.content: Autogo maintains a stock of imported vehicles, carefully selected from the main EU markets (such as Germany, France, Belgium and the Netherlands) or even outside the EU, depending on availability and interest. Any vehicle in stock can be reserved immediately, ensuring priority in shipping.

ComoFunciona_Steps.title: Custom Vehicle Orders
ComoFunciona_Steps.content: If you are looking for a specific model, new version or limited edition, Autogo can handle the import by order directly from the supplier: We search and validate the vehicle with the supplier (dealer or sales platform). We confirm all details: make, model, year, mileage and documentation status (including the Certificate of Conformity – COC). After validation, we reserve the vehicle and start the purchase process.

ComoFunciona_Steps.title: Transport & Logistics
ComoFunciona_Steps.content: After purchase, the vehicle is sent to Portugal using methods adapted to its origin: Within the EU, transport is faster and without additional taxes. Outside the EU, maritime transport is used (Ro-Ro or container), including insurance and customs clearance.

ComoFunciona_Steps.title: Documentation & Legalization in Portugal
ComoFunciona_Steps.content: Customs Registration (DAV): Vehicle Customs Declaration (DAV) on the Finance Portal, allows temporary circulation. Deadline: 20 days after arrival. Technical Inspection (IPO/Inspection B): Mandatory for vehicles >4 years old. The vehicle is inspected and receives the Model 112 Certificate. COC Homologation: The Certificate of Conformity is homologated at IMT to ensure technical compliance with the vehicle. Payment of Taxes (ISV, VAT and IUC): Depending on the origin, model and age of the vehicle, ISV, VAT (23%) and, later, the Single Circulation Tax (IUC) are paid. Issuance of Portuguese Registration and DUA: After IMT approval and payment of taxes, the national registration and the Single Automobile Document (DUA) are requested.

ComoFunciona_Steps.title: Delivery to the Client
ComoFunciona_Steps.content: Autogo delivers the vehicle anywhere in the country, already registered in Portugal, with all documents and insurance included.

ComoFunciona_PorqueAutogo_Lista: Ready-to-reserve stock: fast availability, with priority for early reservations.
Custom import: tailor-made vehicles, with prior inspection and strict document validation.
Turnkey process: we handle all logistics, bureaucracy, inspection and legalization – no worries for you.
Specialists and partners: we know all about taxes and customs procedures, such as ISV, VAT, homologation and inspections.
ComoFunciona_PrazosLista: EU stock: between 1 to 2 weeks until delivery, after arrival and inspection.
International orders: 4 to 8 weeks, depending on transport and nationalization.
Tu escolhes, nós tratamos: You choose, we handle the rest
